channel.title: Npc trading broken?
channel.description:
Hello, I was playing my server but when i went to trade with the npcs i would get dced and get this :
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -20 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18376) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17089) at client.packetSending(client.java:17042) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
If anyone can help me fix this please let me know
Thanks in advance

item.title: Npc trading broken?
item.dc:creator: @Xionation Xionation
item.description:
@Xionation wrote:

demonnd:

if your using mopars client try silabs because for some resson mopars wont show nuls but silabs does mopars will just dc you ^^ hope i helped

unfortunetly no that didnâ€™t do anything thanks for trying though
